content: शस् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (शसति) To cut up, kill, destroy. {vII.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (शस्ति) To sleep. Cf. शंस् also.
शस् {@--1@} A technical name for the termination of the <ab>acc.</ab> plural. {@--2@} A Taddhita affix forming adverbs from nouns, especially from numerals; as द्विशः, शतशः, बहुशः &c.
